From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Monday, 13 January 2025 3:21 PM
To: Yogesh Naresh Patil <Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com>
Cc: Hani Gebara <Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com>
Subject: Claims Intimation for Incident at Versace Young Dubai Mall

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Yogesh,

 

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to formally notify you of a recent incident at the Versace Young Dubai Mall, which has resulted in water damages:

 

Incident Details:

 

*	Date of Incident: January 3, 2025
*	Location: THE DUBAI MALL - VERSACE YOUNG – Unit No SF 124, Second Floor
*	Nature of Incident: Water leakage and inclement weather-related damage

 

Summary of Loss:

 

The incident involved significant water leakage due to adverse weather conditions, leading to damage in the retail area. The attached reports and quotations provide detailed assessments and cost estimates for the necessary repairs and replacements.

 

Attachments:

 

*	Incident and assessment reports
*	Quotations for repair and replacement work
*	Photographic evidence of the damage (1.jpg, 2.jpg, 3.jpg, 4.jpg)

 

The net claimable amount will be approximately USD 2,000 after the application of the policy deductible. Please do advise if you need to appoint a surveyor in order to provide you details on the store contact.

 

Thank you for your cooperation and support.

 

Best regards,

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

Dear Yogesh,

 

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to formally notify you of a recent incident at the Versace Young Dubai Mall, which has resulted in water damages:

 

Incident Details:

 

*	Date of Incident: January 3, 2025
*	Location: THE DUBAI MALL - VERSACE YOUNG – Unit No SF 124, Second Floor
*	Nature of Incident: Water leakage and inclement weather-related damage

 

Summary of Loss:

 

The incident involved significant water leakage due to adverse weather conditions, leading to damage in the retail area. The attached reports and quotations provide detailed assessments and cost estimates for the necessary repairs and replacements.

 

Attachments:

 

*	Incident and assessment reports
*	Quotations for repair and replacement work
*	Photographic evidence of the damage (1.jpg, 2.jpg, 3.jpg, 4.jpg)

 

The net claimable amount will be approximately USD 2,000 after the application of the policy deductible. Please do advise if you need to appoint a surveyor in order to provide you details on the store contact.

 

Thank you for your cooperation and support.

 

Best regards,

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Monday, 13 January 2025 3:21 PM
To: Yogesh Naresh Patil <Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com>

Subject: Claims Intimation for Incident at Versace Young Dubai Mall

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Yogesh,

 

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to formally notify you of a recent incident at the Versace Young Dubai Mall, which has resulted in water damages:

 

Incident Details:

 

*	Date of Incident: January 3, 2025
*	Location: THE DUBAI MALL - VERSACE YOUNG – Unit No SF 124, Second Floor
*	Nature of Incident: Water leakage and inclement weather-related damage

 

Summary of Loss:

 

The incident involved significant water leakage due to adverse weather conditions, leading to damage in the retail area. The attached reports and quotations provide detailed assessments and cost estimates for the necessary repairs and replacements.

 

Attachments:

 

*	Incident and assessment reports
*	Quotations for repair and replacement work
*	Photographic evidence of the damage (1.jpg, 2.jpg, 3.jpg, 4.jpg)

 

The net claimable amount will be approximately USD 2,000 after the application of the policy deductible. Please do advise if you need to appoint a surveyor in order to provide you details on the store contact.

 

Thank you for your cooperation and support.

 

Best regards,

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> > 
Sent: Monday, 13 January 2025 3:21 PM
To: Yogesh Naresh Patil <Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com <mailto:Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com> >
Cc: Hani Gebara <Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com <mailto:Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com> >
Subject: Claims Intimation for Incident at Versace Young Dubai Mall

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Yogesh,

 

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to formally notify you of a recent incident at the Versace Young Dubai Mall, which has resulted in water damages:

 

Incident Details:

 

*	Date of Incident: January 3, 2025
*	Location: THE DUBAI MALL - VERSACE YOUNG – Unit No SF 124, Second Floor
*	Nature of Incident: Water leakage and inclement weather-related damage

 

Summary of Loss:

 

The incident involved significant water leakage due to adverse weather conditions, leading to damage in the retail area. The attached reports and quotations provide detailed assessments and cost estimates for the necessary repairs and replacements.

 

Attachments:

 

*	Incident and assessment reports
*	Quotations for repair and replacement work
*	Photographic evidence of the damage (1.jpg, 2.jpg, 3.jpg, 4.jpg)

 

The net claimable amount will be approximately USD 2,000 after the application of the policy deductible. Please do advise if you need to appoint a surveyor in order to provide you details on the store contact.

 

Thank you for your cooperation and support.

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> > 
Sent: Monday, 13 January 2025 3:21 PM
To: Yogesh Naresh Patil <Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com <mailto:Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com> >
Cc: Hani Gebara <Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com <mailto:Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com> >
Subject: Claims Intimation for Incident at Versace Young Dubai Mall

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Yogesh,

 

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to formally notify you of a recent incident at the Versace Young Dubai Mall, which has resulted in water damages:

 

Incident Details:

 

*	Date of Incident: January 3, 2025
*	Location: THE DUBAI MALL - VERSACE YOUNG – Unit No SF 124, Second Floor
*	Nature of Incident: Water leakage and inclement weather-related damage

 

Summary of Loss:

 

The incident involved significant water leakage due to adverse weather conditions, leading to damage in the retail area. The attached reports and quotations provide detailed assessments and cost estimates for the necessary repairs and replacements.

 

Attachments:

 

*	Incident and assessment reports
*	Quotations for repair and replacement work
*	Photographic evidence of the damage (1.jpg, 2.jpg, 3.jpg, 4.jpg)

 

The net claimable amount will be approximately USD 2,000 after the application of the policy deductible. Please do advise if you need to appoint a surveyor in order to provide you details on the store contact.

 

Thank you for your cooperation and support.

Incident Details:

 

*	Date of Incident: January 3, 2025
*	Location: THE DUBAI MALL - VERSACE YOUNG – Unit No SF 124, Second Floor
*	Nature of Incident: Water leakage and inclement weather-related damage

 

Summary of Loss:

*	Date of Incident: January 3, 2025
*	Location: THE DUBAI MALL - VERSACE YOUNG – Unit No SF 124, Second Floor
*	Nature of Incident: Water leakage and inclement weather-related damage

 

Summary of Loss:

 

The incident involved significant water leakage due to adverse weather conditions, leading to damage in the retail area. The attached reports and quotations provide detailed assessments and cost estimates for the necessary repairs and replacements.

 

Attachments:

 

*	Incident and assessment reports
*	Quotations for repair and replacement work
*	Photographic evidence of the damage (1.jpg, 2.jpg, 3.jpg, 4.jpg)

 

The net claimable amount will be approximately USD 2,000 after the application of the policy deductible. Please do advise if you need to appoint a surveyor in order to provide you details on the store contact.

 

Thank you for your cooperation and support.

 

Best regards,

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

Summary of Loss:

 

The incident involved significant water leakage due to adverse weather conditions, leading to damage in the retail area. The attached reports and quotations provide detailed assessments and cost estimates for the necessary repairs and replacements.

 

Attachments:

 

*	Incident and assessment reports
*	Quotations for repair and replacement work
*	Photographic evidence of the damage (1.jpg, 2.jpg, 3.jpg, 4.jpg)

 

The net claimable amount will be approximately USD 2,000 after the application of the policy deductible. Please do advise if you need to appoint a surveyor in order to provide you details on the store contact.

 

Thank you for your cooperation and support.

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​
